name: Super Mario Run (Fangame)
description: =============Super Mario Runner============= Hello! Welcome to Super Mario Runner! In this game, Mario runs automatically, but you need to avoid the enemies, and collect coins and power-ups! Pls read the whole description to understand the game better :) ==Controls== -Use the arrow keys to move -Avoid the enemies -Collect coins -Collect power-ups ==Info== Power-ups: 1-Up (Green Mushroom) - Gives you 50 points Super Star - Makes Mario invincible for about 10 seconds, the enemies can't defeat Mario when it's in use. Other info: Coins - Gold Coins that give you points Question Blocks - Hit them to earn 50 points (HOLD up arrow to hit them) Koopa Troopas - Some turtles that keep getting in the way... Goombas - Weird creatures which you should avoid. Spinies - Don't step on them, Ouch! Bullet Bill - A giant missile, better get out of the way... NOTE: The game will keep getting more harder and challenging, enemies will spawn more frequently, so, Stay tuned!
